casebody.data:
No. 10-174. American Electric Power Company, Inc., et al., Petitioners v. Connecticut, et al. 562 U.S. 1091, 131 S. Ct. 813, 2010 U.S. LEXIS 9461.

178 L. Ed. 2d 530,

December 6, 2010.

Petition for writ of certiorari to the United States Court of Appeals for the Second Circuit granted.

Justice Sotomayor took no part in the consideration or decision of this petition.

Same case below, 582 F.3d 309.
